{{also|华阴}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=华阴}}

===Etymology===
Literally: north of [[w:Mount Hua|Mount Hua]] ([[w:Huayin|Huayin]] City is situated to the north of [[w:Mount Hua|Mount Hua]])

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=Huàyīn
|c=waa4 jam1
|cat=pn
}}

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# [[w:Huayin|Huayin]] City (in [[w:Shaanxi|Shaanxi]])

===Usage notes===
Historically, [[w:Huayin|Huayin]] was regarded as a county. However, it was administratively changed to a county-level city in 1990.
